mapper.delete: delete from book where isbn = #{ isbn }
mapper.insert: insert into book(isbn, name, description, publish_date, author, publisher, cDate, cover, category, credit, number) values (#{isbn}, #{name}, #{description}, #{publish_date}, #{author}, #{publisher}, #{cDate}, #{cover}, #{category}, #{credit}, #{number})
mapper.select: select * from book order by cDate desc

select * from book
name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%') and
isbn like concat('%', #{ isbn }, '%')
order by cDate desc
